## Drawr Output

```{r}
data <- linearDataGen(y_int = -4,
                      slope  = 0.8,
                      sigma  = 2.8,
                      x_min   = 0,
                      x_max   = 20,
                      N       = 40)

drawr(data, show_tooltip = TRUE)
```

## Shiny App

To run shiny app in R:
`shiny::runApp(system.file("shinyapp/youdrawit", package = "youdrawitR"))`
